about_the_game: Straight from the neon-soaked cityscapes of the year 20XX, this pulsating synthwave soundtrack will bring you right into the world of competitive arcade esports -- a world of excitement, intrigue, adventure, and sometimes chill vibes when you've had more than enough excitement, intrigue, and adventure for one day. Music by Greg Mirles with guest vocals by Alice Knows Karate, and released by Fiction Factory Games.
